    Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database - Explore SQL query types

    »

    1. What is the only required clause in a SQL query?

      SELECT

      FROM

      WHERE


    2. Which query will get an ordered list of product IDs and descriptions, starting with the largest product ID and ending with the smallest product ID?

      SELECT p.productId FROM Products p ORDER BY p.productId ASC

      SELECT p.id FROM Products p ORDER BY p.productId DESC

      SELECT p.productId, p.description FROM Products p ORDER BY p.productId DESC
